definition: to be a big hit/to be hugely popular
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil

sentences.english: The Twilight franchise has blown up more than anyone could have ever expected back in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 《暮光之城》系類電影在2008年出人意料的爆紅。

definition: to be popular/to be in luck/to have good luck/to develop smoothly
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
lit. burn your hand, feel the heat (idiom)/fig. arrogance of the powerful/a mighty figure no-one dares approach/hot (exciting or in favor)
to amaze the world with a single brilliant feat (idiom); an overnight celebrity
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
